items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t understand what you want him to do.
Tom doesn\'t usually do stupid things like that.
There\'s a little time before the train departs.
There\'s never a dull moment when Tom is around.
They\'re going to tell me the results on Monday.
Tom wouldn\'t let Mary do what she wanted to do.
Tom wrote Mary\'s name in his little black book.
Tom\'s parents died when he was three years old.
Tom\'s point of view is almost the same as mine.
Tom\'s strategy was responsible for the victory.
